meta-tags.title: Almost-Homemade Cranberry Pear Sauce Recipe | Yummly
meta-tags.description: Add freshness and a little zing to canned cranberry sauce. This 5-minute, 3-ingredient sauce is so delicious that no one will guess it starts with a convenient shortcut. Even though it's quick, you can make it ahead up to 4 days. The recipe is a Yummly original created by [Ashley Strickland Freeman](https://www.yummly.com/dish/author/Ashley-Strickland-Freeman).

firebase.name: Almost-Homemade Cranberry Pear Sauce Recipe | Yummly
firebase.description: Add freshness and a little zing to canned cranberry sauce. This 5-minute, 3-ingredient sauce is so delicious that no one will guess it starts with a convenient shortcut. Even though it's quick, you can make it ahead up to 4 days. The recipe is a Yummly original created by [Ashley Strickland Freeman](https://www.yummly.com/dish/author/Ashley-Strickland-Freeman).

description.text: Add freshness and a little zing to canned cranberry sauce. This 5-minute, 3-ingredient sauce is so delicious that no one will guess it starts with a convenient shortcut. Even though it's quick, you can make it ahead up to 4 days. The recipe is a Yummly original created by [Ashley Strickland Freeman](https://www.yummly.com/dish/author/Ashley-Strickland-Freeman).

preparationSteps: Place pear in a medium microwave-safe bowl. Cover with a paper towel and microwave on high until pear is tender, 30 seconds to 1 minute.
Add cranberry sauce and lemon zest and stir until smooth. Serve immediately, let sauce stand at room temperature up to 2 hours, or refrigerate up to 4 days.

attribution.html: Almost-Homemade Cranberry Pear Sauce recipe information powered by
